## Overview

This document provides comprehensive documentation for the AI Post Scheduler WordPress plugin. The plugin consists of **64 core classes** organized into **9 functional categories**.

- **Total Lines of Code**: 18,366
- **Total Features**: 64
- **Categories**: Core Generation, Scheduling & Automation, Content Management, Data Management, User Interface, AI Integration, Database, Configuration, Utilities

## Architecture Diagram

### Overall Plugin Architecture

```mermaid
flowchart TB
    %% Overall Plugin Architecture

    UI[User Interface Layer]
    CTRL[Controller Layer]
    SVC[Service Layer]
    REPO[Repository Layer]
    DB[(Database)]
    AI[AI Engine API]
    WP[WordPress Core]

    UI --> CTRL
    CTRL --> SVC
    SVC --> REPO
    SVC --> AI
    REPO --> DB
    CTRL --> WP
    SVC --> WP

    subgraph Controllers
        ActivityController
        AuthorTopicsController
        AuthorsController
    end

    subgraph Services
        AIService
        EmbeddingsService
        AuthorPostGenerator
    end

    subgraph Repositories
        ActivityRepository
        AuthorTopicLogsRepository
        AuthorTopicsRepository
    end

    Controllers --> Services
    Services --> Repositories

    style UI fill:#e8f5e9,stroke:#2e7d32
    style CTRL fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#ef6c00
    style SVC fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1565c0
    style REPO fill:#fce4ec,stroke:#c2185b
    style DB fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#7b1fa2
    style AI fill:#fff9c4,stroke:#f57f17
    style WP fill:#e0e0e0,stroke:#424242
```
